question: Who won the women’s singles title at the  2019 Madrid Open tennis tournament?
explanation: Kiki Bertens has won women’s singles title at the  2019 Madrid Open tennis tournament. In the final, she defeated Simona Halep 6-4, 6-4 in straight sets to win the coveted title. Earlier, in the ongoing tournament, Top seed Novak Djokovic of Serbia beat Stefanos Tsitsipas of Greece 6-3, 6-4  to win his third Madrid Open Tennis title.
